text: TJ Družstevník Nižný Hrušov is a Slovak football team, based in the town of Nižný Hrušov. The club was founded in 1990. == External links == *at futbalvsfz.sk ==References== Druzstevnik Nizny Hrusov Category:Association football clubs established in 1990 Category:1990 establishments in Slovakia
title: TJ Družstevník Nižný Hrušov
